articles.title: Ancient lizard-like species discovered in Australia - BBC
articles.description: It ends a decades-long mystery surrounding a rare fossil first found by a retired chicken farmer.
articles.content:
Scientists have identified a new species of amphibian that occupied Australia some 247 million years ago. 
The finding ends a mystery that has captivated researchers since the 90s, when the creature… [+2567 chars]

articles.title: Australian Mystery Fossil Identified After 30 Years Of Research - NDTV
articles.description: A mystery fossil accidentally unearthed by an Australian chicken farmer in the 1990s has finally been identified as a stout amphibian with tusks and "gnarly teeth", scientists said Wednesday.
articles.content:
The fossil was found in the mid 1990s near the seaside town of Umina Beach
